rotate_seat_to_new_position.description: Rotate the seat of the chair to a new desirable position.

clean_seat_surface.description: Completely clean the surface of the seat to keep it tidy.

prepare_seat.description: Get the seat ready for usage.

rest_seat.description: Rest the seat back to its original status.

polish_seat.description: Polish the seat to make it clean and shiny.

fold_seat.description: Fold the seat of the chair by rotating it to a closed position.

unfold_seat.description: Unfold the seat of the chair by rotating it to an open position.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat of the chair to remove any dirt.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat of the chair.

clean_seat_again.description: Clean the seat of the chair thoroughly to ensure no dirt is left.

maneuver_seat.description: Try to maneuver the seat of the chair by rotating it.

change_leg_position.description: Change the position of the chair's leg by rotating it.

clean_revolute_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the chair to maintain its hygiene.

prepare_leg.description: Get the leg of chair ready for usage.

rest_leg.description: Rest the leg back to its original status.

polish_leg.description: Polish the leg to make it clean and shiny.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Keep the fixed leg clean by wiping it thoroughly.

leave_fixed_leg_as_is.description: Since the leg is fixed, no action is performed.

prepare_fixed_leg.description: Get the fixed leg of chair ready for usage.

rest_fixed_leg.description: Rest the fixed leg back to its original status.

polish_fixed_leg.description: Polish the fixed leg to make it clean and shiny.

rotate_chair.description: Rotate the whole chair including the leg and seat to a new position.

clean_chair_completely.description: Clean the entire chair including both the seat and leg.

prepare_chair.description: Prepare the whole chair for usage.

rest_chair.description: Rest the whole chair back to its original status.

polish_chair.description: Polish the entire chair including the seat and leg to make it clean and shiny.

fold_chair.description: Fold the entire chair including the seat and leg.

unfold_chair.description: Unfold the entire chair including the seat and leg.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the seat and leg.

rotate_whole_chair.description: Rotate the entire chair including the seat and leg.

re_clean_chair.description: Clean the folding chair again to double check, including the seat and leg.

adjust_chair.description: Adjust the chair by trying to rotate both the seat and the leg.

rotate_revolute_leg_to_new_position.description: Rotate the revolute leg to a new position.

clean_leg_thoroughly.description: Thoroughly clean the leg of the chair.

fold_fixed_leg.description: Since the leg is fixed, no action needs to be made for folding.

fold_rotatable_leg.description: Fold the rotatable leg of the chair by rotating it to a closed position.

unfold_rotatable_leg.description: Unfold the rotatable leg of the chair by rotating it to an open position.

clean_leg.description: Clean the leg of the chair to remove any dirt.

rotate_leg.description: Rotate the leg of the chair.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the chair thoroughly to ensure no dirt is left.

maneuver_rotatable_leg.description: Try to maneuver the rotatable leg of the chair by rotating it.
